name: PaperPlane
description:
This is a small game that simulates the whereabouts of paper planes.

Avoid obstacles by controlling the direction of falling and get high scores.


Game features:

1. You can control the posture of the paper plane by pressing Left or Right.

2. The speed of falling will change with the posture of the paper plane.

3. The higher the score, the faster the flight speed and the more difficult it will become.
